org.dexpi.pid.imaging

Class GraphicBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dexpi.pid.imaging.GraphicBuilder

  • public class GraphicBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Gets all relevant data from the input repository, checks it for errors and creates an errorlog, and finally hands it over to the graphic factory for drawing. In addition a html-imagemap is created. The GraphicBuilder returns a BufferedImage via buildImage(resolutionX) which can be written to a file by passing it to an imageWriter
    Author:
    phbe01
    See Also:
    ImageMapObject, InputRepository, GraphicFactory
